title: Completed Chat restrict But still blocked from ranked for 19 games (which doesnt decrease)
body:
Yeah so I am chat restricted...but at the same time I am not...WTF.
I was previously chat restricted twice. 40 games + 19 games.
So I completed the 40 game CR and have gotten my chat privilages back But the 19 doesnt show if at all. I tried playing a few bot games and normal games and didnt see any change, Games required doesnt tick down.
I can /all chat and pretty much have every functionality Back as far as chat goes. 
But it never shows how many games are left and If I go to Ranked, I am still locked out due to chat restriction.
So to recap:
- I am not chat restrict, I have /all chat and all privilages back, everything as if I am no longer chat restrict.
- when i log in I still get the message "you have been chat restricted for 19 games"
-Completing normal games does NOT bring this number down (I completed 3 normal games and a bot game and still at 19 games required) and I am still locked out of ranked mode due to this "chat restrict" that I am no longer under. But as I said, In game there is no chat restriction. I am not limited to messages, /all chat is not disabled. (in game its as if I am not chat restricted at all) 
WTF man...please fix

replies.body:
Hi there!

I can see how this might be confusing since the punishments were issued at the same time, so I'll take a moment to clarify what's going on here.

"Chat restrictions" and "Ranked restrictions" are two completely separate punishments; players who exhibit a particular level of toxicity in-game have both placed on their account simultaneously. Chat restrictions simply limit how much you can say in-game (and removes /all chat); ranked restrictions don't affect your chat, but prevent you from playing ranked.

Chat restrictions can be worked off in pretty much any match-making mode just by playing games with restrictions in-place; pretty straightforward. However, ranked restrictions require not only to play a certain mode (normal draft), but also require you to win them.

Looking at your account, I do see you've worked off your chat restrictions; cool! However, it doesn't seem there are a lot of normal draft games in your recent history. Lots of Team Builder and Poro King matches. You'll need to start winning some more normal draft games if you want to get back into ranked.

Hope this clears it up!
Riot, thanks for taking the time to help this player, but no teambuilder matches count? I find that weird. Sounds like some code issue.

As far as removing ranked restrictions is concerned, this is not a coding issue; winning in normal draft is the only way to reduce the number of ranked restrictions a player has on an account.

It is fully intentional that Team Builder does not count towards the removal of ranked restrictions.
